titleStmt.title: Great nevvs from Saxony, or, A new and strange relation of the mighty giant Koorbmep of his devouring men and of the great rebellion rasied by him and his confederates in the midd Saxony in a letter sent over from Nodnol to a peer of the realm of England : dated the 10th day of this month of August.
titleStmt.author: B. R.

notesStmt.note: Now made publick for general satisfaction.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
